column1: | duane c mercer. born on: april 4
column5: 2015 at 10:00 am burial: cloverdale cemetery. duane c. mercer
column11: indiana. he was born on april 4
column13: indiana and was the son of the late arthur mercer and mildred [gifford] mercer. he married donna j. [sinclair] mercer on june 8
column14: 1968 and she survives. duane is also survived by his sister phyils jones
column16: california. he was a member of the cloverdale church of christ
column19: indiana and the indianapolis valley of the scottish rite at indianapolis
column20: indiana. he was director of systems and statistics for insurance. funeral services will be held on saturday
column22: 2015 at 10:00 am at the whitaker funeral home
column24: indiana. visitation will be held on friday
column26: 2015 from 6:00 pm until 9:00 pm at the funeral home. interment will be in the cloverdale cemetery. condolences may be sent to the family at: cds@whitakerfuneralhome. net.
